about_the_game:
Beginner friendly 2D vertical and horizontal retro-style little shoot 'em up.

Sharpen your coordination skills by dodging and shooting your way through colourful stages with sound and vision inspired by a golden age of video gaming.

WARNING: GAME CONTAINS FLASHING LIGHTS

9 stages
Easy and Normal Modes with shorter stages and multiple paths
Gauntlet mode with longer stages designed to be challenging
Nightmare Mode - harder randomised custom challenge levels

Beginner friendly with regenerating health
Free Play option to Practice
DPad, Mouse and Analog Controls for precise movement
Primary Weapon with the ability to switch between Wide and Focused Shots on the fly
Unlock choice of 4 charged up secondary weapons

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 6.1+
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Tested with a GeForce 1070 + Laptop with onboard Intel Iris Xe Graphics at full speed
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Should run fine on Steam Deck but I don't have one to test

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Tested on Windows 10 and 11
  • Processor: Any gaming processor released in the last 6 years
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Tested on GeForce 1070 and Laptop with onboard Intel Iris Xe Graphics at full speed
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Recommended:
